DOC.brief_summary: The specific aim of the proposed project is to test two separate self-regulation interventions to prevent weight gain in young adults, one based on making sustained small changes in behavior to prevent weight gain and the other on making periodic larger behavior changes resulting in weight loss.
DOC.criteria: Age 1835 Body mass index between 23 and 30 Interested in preventing weight gain BMI outside of range specified Age outside of range specified History of or current eating disorder or substance abuse Recent weight loss greater than 5% of weight Currently in another research study that would interfere
